title: SMS Verification
subHeader: Before making an application for probate, we need to confirm who you are.
securityCode: We’ve sent you a text message with a security code.
phoneCode: Check your phone for the 6-digit code and enter it in the box below.
forgottenCode: I haven’t received a security code

pin.required: Enter the security code that was sent to your phone
pin.invalid: Enter the security code that was sent to your phone
pin.incorrect: Enter the security code that was sent to your phone
